name: GH2 Robusto
additionalNotes:
Gran Habano GH2 Robusto Natural cigars sport lush Habano wrappers surrounding a savory core of diverse longfiller tobaccos. The smoke is exceptionally creamy with dark, earthy flavors and a spicy finish. As you'd expect from Gran Habano, the quality is top-shelf, making this selection an even greater value.

A bundle cigar sold exclusively by Famous Smokeshop.
